      • getConsistencyLevel

        public ConsistencyLevel getConsistencyLevel()
        Description copied from interface: CassandraParameterAccessor
        Returns ConsistencyLevel for the query operation. By default Cassandra uses ConsistencyLevel.QUORUM. Useful for all gets and puts operations
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        ConsistencyLevel enum

        Description copied from interface: CassandraParameterAccessor

      • getTtl

        public Integer getTtl()
        Description copied from interface: CassandraParameterAccessor
        Returns TTL time in seconds for insert and update operations. It is an expiration time for the stored value in Cassandra. Usefull for insert, update operations.
        Specified by:
        getTtl in interface CassandraParameterAccessor
        Returns:
        ttl in seconds

      • getTimestamp

        public Long getTimestamp()
        Description copied from interface: CassandraParameterAccessor
        Return timestamp long in milliseconds. Each cell in Cassandra has timestamp. Usefull for insert, update, delete operations.
        Specified by:
        getTimestamp in interface CassandraParameterAccessor
        Returns:
